summary: Southwest Alaska is a region of the U.S.
full_text: The Pribilof Islands  are a group of four volcanic islands off the coast of mainland Alaska, in the Bering Sea, about 200 miles  north of Unalaska and 200 miles southwest of Cape Newenham. The Siberia coast is roughly 500 miles  northwest. About 200 km2  in total area, they are mostly rocky and are covered with tundra, with a population of 572 as of the 2010 census.
title: Pribilof Islands
